name: Jewelry Generator
explanation: Jewelry for person appearance and treasure tables. Entries have been sorted from common to rare. Subtables present materials known in different types of genres and worlds. The first subtables are compatible with the largest number of worlds, and get more specialized towards the end. Non-generic subtables are not called by default to retain compatibility with most settings. Some subtables intentionally overlap. See also: gem. Date: 2019-09-26. Authors: Johnn Four, Jochen Linnemann, Esko Vesala. Sources: Wikipedia.org.
structure: Produces entries for different types of genres and worlds. The 'common' and 'rare' tables are generic and should be compatible with almost any world. To retain compatibility with most settings, the  non-generic tables should be called only from other tables by specifying their name directly. Some subtables intentionally overlap.

tables.name: hair jewelry
tables.explanation: Common jewellery worn in the hair.
entries: hair stick (for holding a hair bun)

tables.name: rare hair jewelry
tables.explanation: Rare jewellery worn in the hair.

tables.name: head jewelry
tables.explanation: Common jewellery worn on the head.
entries: dangle earring (hanging from the bottom of the earlobe)
barbell earring (orbs connected by a bar)

tables.name: rare head jewelry
tables.explanation: Rare jewellery worn on the head.
entries: wreath made of a precious metal

tables.name: crown
entries: radiant crown (curved band with points presenting rays)
arched crown (with bands over the head)
celestial crown (surmounted with spikes topped by stars)
astral crown (lateral points topped by stars surrounded by wings)

tables.name: neck jewelry
tables.explanation: Common jewellery worn around the neck.
entries: locket (for storing for example a curl of hair)

tables.name: rare neck jewelry
tables.explanation: Rare jewellery worn around the neck.
entries: string necktie (cord secured with ornamental clasp)

tables.name: chest jewelry
tables.explanation: Common jewellery worn on the chest.

tables.name: rare chest jewelry
tables.explanation: Rare jewellery worn on the chest.
entries: gorgerine (metal discs worn on the chest)

tables.name: arm jewelry
entries: beaded bracelet (loose beads on a string)

tables.name: hand jewelry
entries: signet ring (for imprinting a wax seal)

tables.name: rare hand jewelry
entries: slave bracelet (bracelet chained to a ring)
pair of rings joined by a chain
rosary ring (rotated on finger to keep track of prayers)
puzzle ring (interlocking rings forming a single band)
poison ring (with a compartment under the bezel)
key ring (with a key mounted on the bezel)
finger armor ring (jointed cover for whole finger)

tables.name: waist jewelry
tables.explanation: Common jewellery worn around the waist.

tables.name: rare waist jewelry
tables.explanation: Rare jewellery worn around the waist.

tables.name: foot jewelry
entries: a matched pair of toe rings

tables.name: rare foot jewelry
entries: pair of toe rings joined with a chain
